messages.subject: economic question
messages.msgSnippet: any economists on this list who can explain to me in layperson s terms why roosevelt took the u.s. off the gold standard?  that is, i understand it was done to
messages.messageBody:
any economists on this list who can explain to me in layperson's terms
why roosevelt took the u.s. off the gold standard? that is, i
understand it was done to boost the depression economy, but i don't
understand WHY the move off gold would be a boost. i'll blame my
request for a very simple explanation on the fact that i'm trying to
explain this to a small child who wants to know what paper money stands
for and why it doesn't stand for gold anymore. i can't find any
resources at the library that present a basic explanation -- if you know
of one, please advise. thank you.

--
Jessica Kelly
W o r d U p
